<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_sg_write_back_action_item"><sys_sg_write_back_action_item action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><description/><execution_script><![CDATA[(function WriteBackAction(input) {
    //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
    var grs = new GlideRecord("x_1434439_my_tem_0_work_status_request_task");
    grs.addQuery("sys_id", input.sys_id);
    grs.query();
    if (grs.next()) {
        var gr = new GlideRecord("x_1434439_my_tem_0_status_report");
        gr.addQuery("sys_id", grs.self_report);
        gr.query();
        if (gr.next()) {
            gr.setValue("status", "status_requested");
            gr.update();
        }
    }
})(input);]]></execution_script><name>Request status dashboard</name><parameter_screen/><query_condition/><sys_class_name>sys_sg_write_back_action_item</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-29 17:32:17</sys_created_on><sys_id>5b32a25c72220210f7e97089bd92f299</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Request status dashboard</sys_name><sys_package display_value="My Template App" source="x_1434439_my_tem_0">7232625c53220210d9568cfbe92e8074</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="My Template App">7232625c53220210d9568cfbe92e8074</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_sg_write_back_action_item_5b32a25c72220210f7e97089bd92f299</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-29 17:32:17</sys_updated_on><table/><template/><type>script</type><use_current_record_as_condition>true</use_current_record_as_condition><use_fields_for_ref_lookup>false</use_fields_for_ref_lookup></sys_sg_write_back_action_item></record_update>
